description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Based on the 2012 FIRST® Robotics Competition, Catalyst 2012 is a game where up to 4 players compete in a basketball-like game with 5 foot tall, 120 pound robots! To win the match you will need to strategize with your alliance partner and customize your robot to one of over 900 unique  configurations!
